img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game set in a forest environment. A character is standing in front of a glowing blue flame, possibly interacting with it. The interface shows the character has collected "Cat's Eye Beads" categorized as "Curios." The character possesses 691 units of "Will" and 1 "Stone Spirit." Additionally, there is a visual indicator of "Sparks" with a count of 2. Various icons and bars are visible, indicating the character's status or abilities. The game appears to involve exploration and collection of mystical items.
